org.apache.taverna.platform.execution.api

Interface ExecutionEnvironment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExecutionEnvironment, LocalExecutionEnvironment

    public interface ExecutionEnvironment
    The ExecutionEnvironment specifies the capabilities of a workflow execution environment.
    Author:
    David Withers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean activityExists(URI uri)
      Returns true iff an activity exists for the specified URI in this ExecutionEnvironment.
      boolean dispatchLayerExists(URI uri)
      Returns true iff a dispatch layer exists for the specified URI in this ExecutionEnvironment.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getActivityConfigurationSchema(URI uri)
      Returns a JSON Schema for the configuration required by an activity.
      Set<URI> getActivityTypes()
      Returns the activity types available in this ExecutionEnvironment.
      String getDescription()
      Returns a description of this ExecutionEnvironment.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getDispatchLayerConfigurationSchema(URI uri)
      Returns a JSON Schema for the configuration required by a dispatch layer.
      Set<URI> getDispatchLayerTypes()
      Returns the dispatch layer types available in this ExecutionEnvironment.
      ExecutionService getExecutionService()
      Returns the ExecutionService that provides this ExecutionEnvironment.
      String getID()
      Returns the identifier for this ExecutionEnvironment.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this ExecutionEnvironment.

      • getActivityConfigurationSchema

        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getActivityConfigurationSchema(URI uri)
                                                                throws ActivityNotFoundException,
                                                                       ActivityConfigurationException
        Returns a JSON Schema for the configuration required by an activity.
        Parameters:
        uri - a URI that identifies an activity
        Returns:
        a JSON Schema for the configuration required by an activity
        Throws:
        ActivityNotFoundException - if an activity cannot be found for the specified URI
        ActivityConfigurationException - if the ConfigurationDefinition cannot be created

      • getDispatchLayerTypes

        Set<URI> getDispatchLayerTypes()
        Returns the dispatch layer types available in this ExecutionEnvironment.
        Returns:
        the dispatch layer types available in this ExecutionEnvironment

      • dispatchLayerExists

        boolean dispatchLayerExists(URI uri)
        Returns true iff a dispatch layer exists for the specified URI in this ExecutionEnvironment.
        Parameters:
        uri - the dispatch layer URI to check
        Returns:
        true if a dispatch layer exists for the specified URI in this ExecutionEnvironment

      • getDispatchLayerConfigurationSchema

        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getDispatchLayerConfigurationSchema(URI uri)
                                                                     throws DispatchLayerNotFoundException,
                                                                            DispatchLayerConfigurationException
        Returns a JSON Schema for the configuration required by a dispatch layer.
        Parameters:
        uri - a URI that identifies a dispatch layer
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DispatchLayerNotFoundException - if a dispatch layer cannot be found for the specified URI
        DispatchLayerConfigurationException - if the ConfigurationDefinition cannot be created
